Text: Hey  thanks for your hard work. I was wondering if you had Scarygirl by Nathan Jurevicicus? Thanks a ton

kentcave, here's the manga:

Val_Wood, sorry I don't have Scarygirl, but LeonardTSpock might as he has a lot of SLG, though Scarygirl isn't published by SLG, but they do sell it.
thanks for checking ... and for making it easy to try before buy for some of us broke folks with wild ambitions of reading everything we get stoked for
